_comment: Updated norms database: removed non-mandatory ISO/legacy standards, updated Battery Regulation to 2023/1542, added ATEX, Energy Labelling 2017/1369, ErP 2019/2020, SAR/human exposure standards, packaging amendments. Based on 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Low Voltage Directive (LVD)
norms.applies_to: All electrical equipment 50-1000V AC or 75-1500V DC
norms.description: Core safety directive ensuring protection against electric shock, fire, and mechanical hazards

norms.name: Electromagnetic Compatibility Directive (EMC)
norms.applies_to: All equipment capable of generating or being affected by electromagnetic disturbance
norms.description: Ensures equipment doesn't generate excessive EM interference and has adequate immunity

norms.name: RoHS Directive (Restriction of Hazardous Substances)
norms.description: Restricts use of specific hazardous materials (lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, PBB, PBDE, and phthalates)

norms.name: WEEE Directive (Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment)
norms.description: Requires proper disposal/recycling marking and producer responsibility for end-of-life equipment

norms.name: Technical Documentation for Assessment of Electrical and Electronic Products
norms.description: Standard for technical documentation demonstrating RoHS compliance

norms.name: Audio/Video, ICT and Communication Technology Equipment - Safety
norms.applies_to: IT equipment, AV equipment, communication equipment
norms.description: Modern hazard-based safety standard replacing EN 60950-1 and EN 60065. Covers safeguards against electric shock, fire, heat, mechanical, radiation hazards

norms.name: Assessment of Electronic Equipment Related to Human Exposure to EM Fields
norms.applies_to: Equipment with RF transmitters or strong EM fields
norms.description: Evaluation of equipment against basic restrictions for human exposure to EM fields 0Hz-300GHz

norms.name: Safety of Machinery - Electrical Equipment
norms.description: Safety requirements for electrical equipment of machines operating at voltages above 50V AC or 75V DC

norms.name: Generic Immunity Standard - Residential/Commercial/Light Industry
norms.applies_to: Products for residential, commercial, and light industrial environments
norms.description: Immunity requirements for emissions in non-industrial environments

norms.name: Generic Immunity Standard - Industrial
norms.description: Immunity requirements for harsh industrial environments with higher disturbance levels

norms.name: Generic Emission Standard - Residential/Commercial/Light Industry
norms.applies_to: Products for residential, commercial, and light industrial environments
norms.description: Emission limits to prevent disturbance to other equipment in residential areas

norms.name: Generic Emission Standard - Industrial
norms.description: Emission limits for industrial environment equipment

norms.name: Multimedia Equipment - Emission Requirements
norms.description: Limits and methods for measuring radio disturbance from multimedia equipment

norms.name: Multimedia Equipment - Immunity Requirements
norms.description: Immunity requirements for multimedia equipment against EM disturbances

norms.name: Household Appliances - Emissions
norms.applies_to: Household appliances, electric tools, similar apparatus
norms.description: Emission limits for household electrical appliances and similar equipment

norms.name: Household Appliances - Immunity
norms.applies_to: Household appliances, electric tools, similar apparatus
norms.description: Immunity requirements for household appliances

norms.name: ESD (Electrostatic Discharge) Immunity
norms.description: Testing immunity to static electricity discharge (contact and air discharge)

norms.name: Radiated RF Immunity
norms.description: Immunity to radiated electromagnetic fields (80MHz-6GHz)

norms.name: EFT (Electrical Fast Transient) Immunity
norms.applies_to: Equipment with AC/DC power and signal ports
norms.description: Immunity to fast transients/bursts on power and signal lines

norms.name: Surge Immunity
norms.description: Immunity to voltage surges caused by lightning or switching

norms.name: Conducted RF Immunity
norms.description: Immunity to conducted RF disturbances on cables (150kHz-80MHz)

norms.name: Power Frequency Magnetic Field Immunity
norms.description: Immunity to 50Hz magnetic fields

norms.name: Voltage Dips, Interruptions and Variations Immunity
norms.description: Immunity to voltage dips, short interruptions, and voltage variations on AC supply

norms.name: Radio Equipment Directive (RED)
norms.applies_to: All equipment intentionally transmitting/receiving radio waves
norms.description: Replaces R&TTE Directive. Covers radio equipment safety, EMC, and efficient spectrum use

norms.name: EMC for Radio Equipment - Part 1: Common Technical Requirements
norms.description: General EMC requirements for radio equipment and services

norms.name: EMC for Radio - Wideband Data Transmission Systems
norms.description: Specific EMC requirements for wideband data transmission systems

norms.name: Wideband Transmission Systems - 2.4GHz
norms.applies_to: Equipment operating in 2.4GHz ISM band (WiFi, Bluetooth)
norms.description: Technical requirements for 2.4GHz band equipment including spectrum efficiency

norms.name: Short Range Devices (SRD)
norms.description: Requirements for various short-range devices including remote controls, alarms, telemetry

norms.name: Broadband Radio Access Networks (BRAN) 5GHz
norms.description: Harmonized standard for 5GHz wireless LAN equipment

norms.name: Global System for Mobile Communications (GSM)
norms.description: Requirements for GSM and similar mobile communication devices

norms.name: IMT Cellular Networks (3G/4G/5G)
norms.description: Requirements for equipment operating in IMT-2000/LTE/5G networks

norms.name: Battery Regulation (replaces 2006/66/EC)
norms.description: New battery regulation with requirements for labeling, documentation, recycling, supply chain traceability, and digital battery passport. Mandatory from August 2025.

norms.name: Safety of Portable Sealed Secondary Lithium Cells and Batteries
norms.description: Safety requirements and tests for lithium batteries in portable applications

norms.name: Power Sources (PS1/PS2/PS3)
norms.description: Classification of power sources and associated safeguards in modern safety standard

norms.name: Harmonic Current Emissions
norms.description: Limits for harmonic currents injected into AC supply (up to 40th harmonic)

norms.name: Voltage Fluctuations and Flicker
norms.applies_to: Equipment that may cause voltage fluctuations
norms.description: Limits for voltage fluctuations and flicker caused by equipment

norms.name: LED Modules for General Lighting - Safety
norms.description: Safety requirements specifically for LED modules

norms.name: Luminaires - General Requirements and Tests
norms.description: General safety requirements for all luminaires

norms.name: Photobiological Safety of Lamps and Lamp Systems
norms.description: Assessment of blue light and other optical radiation hazards

norms.name: Lighting Equipment - EMC Immunity Requirements
norms.description: EMC immunity requirements specific to lighting equipment

norms.name: Radio Disturbance from Lighting Equipment
norms.description: Limits and measurement methods for radio disturbance from lighting equipment

norms.name: Ecodesign Directive
norms.description: Framework for setting ecodesign requirements (energy efficiency, resource use)

norms.name: Ecodesign for External Power Supplies
norms.applies_to: External AC-DC and AC-AC power supplies
norms.description: Energy efficiency requirements for external power supplies

norms.name: Ecodesign for Light Sources and Control Gear
norms.description: Energy efficiency and functionality requirements for lighting

norms.name: Energy Labeling Directive
norms.description: Framework for energy efficiency labeling (A-G scale)

norms.name: REACH Regulation
norms.description: Registration, evaluation, and authorization of chemicals. SVHC substance restrictions

norms.name: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)
norms.description: Data protection and privacy requirements for EU residents' personal data

norms.name: ePrivacy Directive (Cookie Law)
norms.description: Privacy requirements for electronic communications and cookies

norms.name: Industrial Communication Networks - Security (Series)
norms.description: Cybersecurity standards for industrial automation and control systems. Increasingly relevant for IoT

norms.name: Cybersecurity for Consumer IoT
norms.description: Baseline security requirements for consumer IoT (becoming increasingly important)

norms.name: Packaging and Packaging Waste Directive
norms.description: Requirements for packaging material composition and recycling/recovery targets

norms.name: Consumer Information Regulation
norms.description: Requirements for clear product information and labeling

norms.name: Electricity Metering Equipment
norms.description: Requirements for accuracy and reliability of metering equipment

norms.name: Sound System Equipment - Headphones Maximum Sound Pressure
norms.description: Limits for sound pressure to protect hearing

norms.name: USB Specifications (USB 2.0/3.x/4/Type-C/PD)
norms.description: Not EU standards but required for USB compliance. Includes electrical, protocol, and power delivery specs

norms.name: Universal Serial Bus for Data and Power
norms.description: Covers USB electrical interface requirements

norms.name: ICT Equipment EMC
norms.description: Combined emission and immunity for IT equipment

norms.name: ICT Safety
norms.description: Primary safety standard for IT equipment

norms.name: Automatic Electrical Controls - General Requirements
norms.description: Safety requirements for automatic controls

norms.name: General Requirements for Home and Building Systems (HBES)
norms.description: Requirements for home automation and building control systems

norms.name: Portable Device Safety
norms.description: Safety requirements applicable to wearable electronics

norms.name: Product Standard for Human Exposure to EM Fields (Body-Worn)
norms.description: SAR limits and testing for devices worn on the body

norms.name: ATEX Directive (Equipment for Explosive Atmospheres)
norms.applies_to: Equipment and protective systems intended for use in potentially explosive atmospheres
norms.description: Mandatory for products marketed for use in hazardous areas with risk of explosion (industrial, mining, chemical plants)

norms.name: Energy Labelling Regulation
norms.applies_to: Energy-related products sold to end-users (lighting, HVAC, displays, refrigeration)
norms.description: Requires energy efficiency labeling (A-G scale) for covered product groups. Replaces 2010/30/EU.

norms.name: Ecodesign for Light Sources and Control Gear (ErP)
norms.description: Specific ecodesign requirements for LED light sources: energy efficiency, product disclosure, life-cycle information

norms.name: Assessment of Electronic Equipment Related to Human Exposure to EM Fields
norms.applies_to: Equipment with RF transmitters or strong EM fields, especially wearables
norms.description: Mandatory evaluation of equipment against basic restrictions for human exposure to EM fields 0Hz-300GHz. SAR assessment for body-worn RF devices.

norms.name: Product Standard for Human Exposure to EM Fields (Body-Worn)
norms.applies_to: Body-worn RF transmitting devices (wearables, headphones with Bluetooth)
norms.description: SAR limits and testing for devices worn on the body. Mandatory for body-worn wireless devices.

norms.name: Packaging and Packaging Waste Directive (Amendment)
norms.description: Updated packaging requirements for recyclability, labeling, and traceability. Amends DIR-94/62/EC.
